mapper.select: SELECT e_no,e_name,TO_CHAR(e_startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') e_startdate,TO_CHAR(e_enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') e_enddate,e_content,e_picture,num FROM (SELECT e_no,e_name,e_startdate,e_enddate,e_content,e_picture,rownum as num FROM (SELECT e_no,e_name,e_startdate,e_enddate,e_content,e_picture FROM event ORDER BY e_enddate ASC )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT e_no,e_name,TO_CHAR(e_startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') e_startdate,TO_CHAR(e_enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') e_enddate,e_content,e_picture,num FROM (SELECT e_no,e_name,e_startdate,e_enddate,e_content,e_picture,rownum as num FROM (SELECT e_no,e_name,e_startdate,e_enddate,e_content,e_picture FROM event WHERE e_enddate>=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY e_enddate ASC )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/9) FROM event WHERE e_enddate<=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')
